biotools.summary: Unified gene expression resource for plants and plant pathogens. It is a genotype to phenotype, hypothesis building information warehouse, leveraging highly parallel expression data with seamless portals to related genetic, physical, and pathway data.

bioschemas.name: PLEXdb
